# UIPencilInteraction

**Class**

An interaction that tells your app when a person double-taps or squeezes Apple Pencil.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class UIPencilInteraction
```

## Overview

People can interact with certain models of Apple Pencil with a double tap or squeeze. To detect the double tap or squeeze in your app, create a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPencilInteraction] object with a corresponding [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPencilInteraction/delegate] object. Then, add the interaction to your app’s view. When a person double-taps or squeezes Apple Pencil, the interaction calls the delegate’s corresponding [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPencilInteractionDelegate/pencilInteraction(_:didReceiveTap:)] or [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPencilInteractionDelegate/pencilInteraction(_:didReceiveSqueeze:)] method.

For more information, read [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ApplePencil/handling-double-taps-from-apple-pencil] and [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ApplePencil/handling-squeezes-from-apple-pencil].

## Creating interactions

- **init(delegate:)**: Creates an interaction with the specified delegate.

## Handling interactions

- **delegate**: The object that handles the double-tap or squeeze interactions a person makes on Apple Pencil.
- **UIPencilInteractionDelegate**: The interface an object implements to handle double taps or squeezes a person makes on Apple Pencil.

## Enabling interactions

- **isEnabled**: A Boolean value that specifies whether the system reports double taps or squeezes on Apple Pencil to your app.

## Determining preferences for actions

- **preferredTapAction**: A person’s preferred double-tap action for Apple Pencil, as specified in the Settings app.
- **preferredSqueezeAction**: A person’s preferred squeeze action for Apple Pencil, as specified in the Settings app.
- **UIPencilPreferredAction**: The actions Apple Pencil can perform after a person performs a double tap or squeeze.

## Determining input type

- **prefersPencilOnlyDrawing**: A person’s preference for drawing with Apple Pencil only, as specified in the Settings app or the system tool picker.

## Determining hover preview preferences

- **prefersHoverToolPreview**: A person’s preference for whether holding a supported model of Apple Pencil close to the screen shows a preview of the current drawing tool, as specified in the Settings app.

## Supporting types

- **UIPencilInteraction.Tap**: An interaction that represents a double tap on Apple Pencil.
- **UIPencilInteraction.Squeeze**: An interaction that represents a squeeze on Apple Pencil.

## Apple Pencil interactions in UIKit

- **UIPencilInteractionDelegate**: The interface an object implements to handle double taps or squeezes a person makes on Apple Pencil.
- **UIPencilInteraction.Tap**: An interaction that represents a double tap on Apple Pencil.
- **UIPencilInteraction.Squeeze**: An interaction that represents a squeeze on Apple Pencil.
- **UIPencilInteraction.Phase**: Constants that describe the phases of an interaction on Apple Pencil.
- **UIPencilHoverPose**: An object that describes the hover pose of Apple Pencil during an interaction like double tap or squeeze.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
- Sendable
- UIInteraction
